meanings.definition: Panels or sections of wood used for decorative or protective purposes on walls.
meanings.sent1: The panellings on the walls added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter carefully installed the panellings in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the panellings on the wall, thinking they were a ladder.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a set of panellings, shielding her true emotions from the world.
meanings.sent5: The intricate panellings resembled a beautiful mosaic of wood and craftsmanship.

meanings.definition: The act of installing or covering with panels.
meanings.sent1: The panellings of the new house were done by skilled workers.
meanings.sent2: She completed the panellings of the room in just a day.
meanings.sent3: The panellings of the wall seemed to dance as they were being put up.
meanings.sent4: His words were like panellings, covering up the truth with a facade.
meanings.sent5: The panellings of the stage transformed the room into a grand theater.

meanings.definition: A decorative or protective covering made of panels.
meanings.sent1: The intricate panellings were the highlight of the room's design.
meanings.sent2: She admired the panellings on the antique cabinet.
meanings.sent3: The panellings on the door seemed to whisper secrets to those who passed by.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a set of panellings, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The panellings on the building's exterior gave it a regal appearance.
